action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
National Cybersecurity Exercise Act of 2018
This bill requires the U.S. Cyber Command, the U.S. Northern Command, and other Department of Defense commands or components, consistent with the recommendations made by a Government Accountability Office report, to conduct a tier 1 exercise of support to civil authorities for a cyber incident.
